title: Chem Kinetics & Catal
description: The basic principles of chemical reaction kinetics, including rate laws, mechanisms, and heterogeneous catalysis are introduced.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHEM 1212K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CHBE 2100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
